TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Biung_Tak-Banuaz, title = Biung_Tak-Banuaz, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Biung_Tak-Banuaz} }

S.FORM: ti Biung lja Tak-Banuaz (Binunan: Biung Sauhluman Tankisia Takisvislainan Tak-Banuaz, 1975.7.26－) a kisansemenasenay i taiwan. a qinaljan nimadju aicu a yenpin i tua valangaw (taitu king). tjaivililj a kinitjaula nimadju a kemasi tua daigakku na dayeh i chionghoa king (Changhua County), na vaikanga timadju a masengseng i taihuku. kisansenasenayan sikamasansimatjelj a sinipapuligu ni biung tua semenay ta vinarungan aza "maqadaw ayatua meljayanga" i tua papuliguan tua semenay, tazua tatuluan nimadju i daigakku kacaviljan a 1999. maciuciuranga tia biung, azua kaka a uqaljay nimadju katua qali nimadju a semenay kacaviljan a 2000. kinateveteveljan niamadju aza "kakedriyan se kinacalisiyan." pasavililj a mumalj a sinipapuligu nimadju tua semenay ta vinarungan aza "山谷裡的吶喊." sangasangasan a sasupuan nua sinenay nimadju ta vinarungan i taza pinapuliguan nua kikingkay ni teresa lja teng . pavavecikan timadju taza pavelian na WIND tua senasenay nu qemacuvung timadju ta tatuluan nimadju i tua daigakku na dayeh kacaviljan a 2000. namasan rusenasenay timadju tazua sangasangasan a sinansenay nimadju a "cinunan" ayain nu qiljas a unem nua maljian a cavilj. sinipungadan nimdju aza sinansenayan a "cinunan" tua tjaljabulayan a uqaljay a kisansemenasenay nua zumanga a kinakaian i tua sikamasansimuluq sa drusa quljizar a pinapuliguan ta senay ka 2001 a caviljan. mavananga a sikamasanmusalj a sinansenay ni biung aza "biung" ka 30 a qadavan nua 8 a qiljas nua kacaviljan a 2001. sinipapuligu nimadju aza sinansenayan a "biung" tua tjaljabulayan a uqaljay a kisansemenasenay nua zumanga a kinakaian i tua sikamasansimuluq sa tjelu quljizar a pinapuliguan ta senay katjaivililj a 2002 a caviljan. sinenay ta vinarungan "LOKAH"- kacaviljan a 2013 iga "kemaljava tua alibangbang"- namasan 謝避風 ti biung i taza iga kacaviljan a 2005. pinapuliguan sikamasansimuluq sa tjelu a quljizar a pinapuliguan ta senay tjaljabulayan a uqaljay a kisansemenasenay nua zumanga a kinakaian

ti Biong lja Tak-Banoaz (Binonan: Biong Saohloman Tankisia Takisvislainan Tak-Banoaz, 1975.7.26－) a kisansemenasenay i taiwan. a qinaljan nimadjo aico a yenpin i toa valangaw (taito king). tjaivililj a kinitjaola nimadjo a kemasi toa daigakko na dayeh i chionghoa king (Changhoa Coonty), na vaikanga timadjo a masengseng i taihoko. kisansenasenayan sikamasansimatjelj a sinipapoligo ni biong toa semenay ta vinarongan aza "maqadaw ayatoa meljayanga" i toa papoligoan toa semenay, tazoa tatoloan nimadjo i daigakko kacaviljan a 1999. maciocioranga tia biong, azoa kaka a oqaljay nimadjo katoa qali nimadjo a semenay kacaviljan a 2000. kinateveteveljan niamadjo aza "kakedriyan se kinacalisiyan." pasavililj a momalj a sinipapoligo nimadjo toa semenay ta vinarongan aza "山谷裡的吶喊." sangasangasan a sasopoan noa sinenay nimadjo ta vinarongan i taza pinapoligoan noa kikingkay ni teresa lja teng . pavavecikan timadjo taza pavelian na WIND toa senasenay no qemacovong timadjo ta tatoloan nimadjo i toa daigakko na dayeh kacaviljan a 2000. namasan rosenasenay timadjo tazoa sangasangasan a sinansenay nimadjo a "cinonan" ayain no qiljas a onem noa maljian a cavilj. sinipongadan nimdjo aza sinansenayan a "cinonan" toa tjaljabolayan a oqaljay a kisansemenasenay noa zomanga a kinakaian i toa sikamasansimoloq sa drosa qoljizar a pinapoligoan ta senay ka 2001 a caviljan. mavananga a sikamasanmosalj a sinansenay ni biong aza "biong" ka 30 a qadavan noa 8 a qiljas noa kacaviljan a 2001. sinipapoligo nimadjo aza sinansenayan a "biong" toa tjaljabolayan a oqaljay a kisansemenasenay noa zomanga a kinakaian i toa sikamasansimoloq sa tjelo qoljizar a pinapoligoan ta senay katjaivililj a 2002 a caviljan. sinenay ta vinarongan "LOKAH"- kacaviljan a 2013 iga "kemaljava toa alibangbang"- namasan 謝避風 ti biong i taza iga kacaviljan a 2005. pinapoligoan sikamasansimoloq sa tjelo a qoljizar a pinapoligoan ta senay tjaljabolayan a oqaljay a kisansemenasenay noa zomanga a kinakaian
